EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_dotNET CloudNative Bootcamp_Irvine_Q317.Reminder NET Bootcamp Emai
EmailTemplate.subject: .NET Cloud-Native Bootcamp Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We look forward to seeing you at the .NET Cloud-Native Bootcamp, hosted by Pivotal at EMC. As a reminder, this will be a full, fun day to learn about patterns and technology. We’ll take care of breakfast and lunch, so don’t worry about packing anything! Please make sure that you’ve installed the Cloud Foundry CLI <[[https://docs.cloudfoundry.org/cf-cli/install-go-cli.html#installer]]> (versions exist for Windows, Mac, and Linux) on your laptop. Also, be sure to have a development environment handy, as we’ll be slinging some code together. Pivotal will take care of providing the initial source code, and hosting environment. If you’d like to read up on Cloud Foundry <[[http://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/1-10/concepts/index.html]]> and Steeltoe <[[https://steeltoe.io/]]>, feel free. But don’t worry, we’ll do an engaging deep dive together tomorrow.
Date: Wednesday, August 16, 2017
Time:
8:30AM to 4:45PM
Location:
Dell EMC Floor 1 - Princeton AB 135 Technology Dr Irvine, CA 92618 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/EMC/@33.6623806,-117.7473405,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x5075dc655e38db08!8m2!3d33.6623806!4d-117.7473405]]>)
Should you have any questions, would like more information, or are no longer able to attend, please contact the organizer at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/dot-NET-Cloud-Native-Bootcamp-Seattle.html]]>
